description: IllumiDesk helps you create end to end courses with A.I. With IllumiDesk's A.I., you can also add documents to support better context for the generative A.I. model.
title: Course with AI
introduction: This website uses cookies to enhance user experience and provide personalized services.

faqs.question: Why does this website use cookies?
faqs.answer: To improve user experience and provide personalized services.

faqs.question: Will my information be tracked?
faqs.answer: No, your information will not be tracked.

faqs.question: What if I don't want cookies?
faqs.answer: A tiny cookie will be used to remember your preference so you won't be asked again.
